column3: Latest;Siem Reap:------ A man was killed at 7:25 pm on October 22
column6: Siem Reap City.------The victim was identified as 27-year-old Son Veasna
column8: and the suspect as Prem Pru (the victim’s uncle).------Authorities said that prior to the incident
column9: the uncle had argued with the his nephew
column10: and then the victim waved around a bamboo stick and called the suspect outside.------The suspect then came out of the house with a knife and a sword and struck the victim
column11: killing him. He then fled to a neighbor’s house.------The victim was taken to the Siem Reap Referral Hospital
column12: but died fro injuries to his head and arm.------The suspect was arrested for questioning. ------POST NEWS
